articles.title: Acer Unveils Three New Gaming Monitors With Super-Fast Refresh Rates - ChannelNews

articles.title: Nintendo's savage response to take over - Whitsunday Times
articles.description: A burgeoning video game rival once approached Mario-maker Nintendo with a lucrative offer. The bosses didn’t think much of it.
articles.content:
